entry.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.18
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 6, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 8, 15:00 UTC

Jun 3, 02:35 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/09/2022 07:00 UTC
End time : 08/09/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Every Kubernetes 1.18 will be force upgraded to the next minor version (1.19)
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade a deprecated cluster to a supported newer version

entry.title: [GRA][BHS] [Data logs] Index backend migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 15, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Apr 15, 00:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/06/2022 12:00 UTC
End time : 15/06/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : No downtime expected in term of log ingestion, but ES API will not be available for a maximum time of two hours.
Service improvement: The indexation backend of Logs Data Platform will be replaced from Elasticsearch to OpenSearch.
Kibana instances will be replaced by OpenSearch Dashboards ones.

APIv6 calls related to ElasticSearch backend will be automatically redirected to new OpenSearch backend and will remain available until September 2022.

The following documentation : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/logs-data-platform/ will be updated few days before the migration.

Jun 13, 10:50 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 8, 18:11 UTC

entry.title: [GRA/BHS][Enterprise Cloud Databases] - Planned Service End-of-Life
entry.content:
Jun 13, 06:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 13, 09:25 UTC
Update - Dear customers,

In order to avoid last minute migration, we will temporary stop connectivity to your clusters, one week before shutdown.
No actions required, we will disallow connection during short timeslots and then re-allow connections

Timeline
- Monday 07/06/2022 â€“ 14h00 CEST // 10 minutes interruption
- Friday 10/06/2022 - 14h00 CEST // 30 minutes interruption

Dec 20, 05:21 UTC
Scheduled - As part of the product lifecycle management,
We will end the Sales of Enterprise Cloud Databases services January 16th 2022 (no more new services).
We will end the Growth of existing Enterprise Cloud Databases services May 16th 2022 (no more new nodes)
We will end the Support of all Enterprise Cloud Databases services June 16th 2022 (shutdown of the services).

Impacted customers will be notified by email and via control panel about this End-Of-Life process.

We will cut-off the services the week before End of Support during punctual 2 hours time slot, to warn impacted customers.

Perimeter:
All PostgreSQL Enterprise Cloud Databases clusters, worldwide.
Related product page:
[FR] https://www.ovhcloud.com/fr/enterprise/products/enterprise-cloud-databases/
[EN] https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-ie/enterprise/products/enterprise-cloud-databases/

NOT in the Perimeter:
Public Cloud Databases
Web Hosting Cloud Databases


Workaround: customer will be contacted to migrate to new Public Cloud Databases for PostgreSQL.
Migration tutorials and Professional Services will be provided on https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/enterprise-cloud-databases/

Timeline:
17/01/2022 10h CEST : End of Sales
16/05/2022 10h CEST : End of Growth
10/06/2022 10h-14h CEST : planned downtime
13/06/2022 10h CEST : End of Support, Shutdown of all impacted services 10h CEST

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.
